title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
Title: 2.5oz Small Portable Aromatherapy Candle Set – 16 Scented Soy Wax Tin Candles, Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend

Overview:
Delight someone special—or yourself—with a curated set of 16 portable aromatherapy candles. Made with natural soy wax and infused with premium essential oils, each 2.5oz tin delivers clean, long-lasting fragrance and a warm, cozy glow. Perfect for gifting, travel, self-care, party favors, or creating a mood in any room.

What’s Inside:
- Quantity: 16 mini tin candles (2.5oz each)
- Burn Time: Approximately 18–20 hours per candle
- Wax: Natural soy wax
- Fragrance: Premium essential oils
- Containers: Recyclable tin cans

Scent Collection:
- Floral & Fresh: Jasmine, Rose, Gardenia, Peony Cherry Blossom, English Pear & Freesia, Bluebell
- Relaxing & Herbal: Lavender, Rosemary, Wood Sage & Sea Salt
- Sweet & Fruity: Vanilla, Fig, Strawberry, Lemon
- Uplifting & Clean: Bergamot, Spring, Peppermint

Why You’ll Love It:
- Clean burn: Natural soy wax and essential oils for a soot-free, even burn.
- Variety pack: A complete fragrance wardrobe to match every mood and season.
- Travel-ready: Compact tins slip easily into bags, drawers, and gift boxes.
- Reusable tins: Recyclable containers can be repurposed as mini planters, trinket holders, or home décor accents.
- Gift-ready: A thoughtful present for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend—ideal for birthdays, holidays, thank-you gifts, and self-care packages.

How to Use:
- Trim wick to 1/4 inch before each use.
- Place on a heat-resistant surface and allow the wax to melt to the edges to prevent tunneling.
- Enjoy in bedrooms, bathrooms, home offices, and entryways.

Sustainability:
- Natural soy wax and recyclable tins reduce environmental impact.
- Multipurpose containers encourage reuse as flowerpots or décor.

Safety:
- Keep out of reach of children and pets.
- Never leave a burning candle unattended.
- Burn away from drafts and flammable objects.
- Do not move while lit; allow to cool before handling.

Give the gift of everyday calm and curated fragrance with this 16-piece soy wax candle set—perfectly portable, beautifully scented, and made to delight.
